response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This exceptional item holds immense worth and significance, which I believe could greatly benefit and enhance your life or business. Considering its unparalleled quality and rarity, I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase it for $1,200,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring that the product finds a deserving home while also allowing me to maximize its value. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and see the potential it offers. Should you decide to proceed, I would be more than happy to discuss the details and facilitate a smooth transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
